column4: Anyone know why my Remote Desktop (viewer) doesn't refresh when I open folders and click around? The mouse moves correctly, and the refresh rate for that seems okay, but it's not refreshing windows. I have to reconnect to see opened windows :(
can you try using gtkvncviewer ?
I can one minute, please/
Not hosted with VNC on the client PC, does that matter? I got connected but it's just a black screen with a mouse :-\
whats it hosted with?
gnome's built-in remote desktop options in preferences
I thought it would work just as well. :-p
hmm, thats what i use with gtkvncviewer, works fine its a bit laggy
is this wifi?
no, both PC's are hard wired with ethernet.... is that what you mean?
ok, do you have xvnc4viewer open usin a terminal?
ok.
im here.
or do what trism said
but i also had problems with tightvnc
are u using OSS instead of alsa?
MenZa: I'm back. Ubuntu froze... :-\
MenZa: But yeah... sound doesn't share, which I thought was aweful primative.
ever get vnc working fully?

wht about everything else?
